name: Gerber Armbar Drive Multi-Tool
description: A compact multi-tool that puts a few key tools into a compact package that won’t weigh you down. The tool that sets the Armbar Drive apart is its ¼in. hex driver, giving you a proper folding screwdriver with interchangeable bits. Bundled into the compact package with the hex driver is a locking blade, scissors and a few other tools that will make everyday life a little easier.420HC blade is easy to sharpen and holds an edge well.Liner-lock design keeps fingers safe when using the knife.Driver head aligns the screwdriver with the center of the handle letting you apply even torque.Bit head fits standard ¼ in. bits, making the right bit easy to find, and you can mix and match with bits you already own.Compact spring loaded scissors for those cuts a knife isn’t right for.Fold-out backspacer contains a bottle opener and a compact prybar.
